name: Marcy
description:
Marcy

"Learn the intricacies inside the mind of a creative while you control a little being that doesn't quite know what it is or what its destination will be. Yet".

I short half novel, half puzzle game made for the Bitsy jam hosted by Adam Le Doux . Made with Bitsy!

This is my first fully finished and playable game ever and I had such a fun time working with Bitsy tools and limitations. 

My only regret is to learn about hacks a little bit too late (the image to bitsy tool by ruin could've saved me  hours!) 

Enjoy the game!!

PD; please tell me if you find any grammar mistake or bugs. Also, feel free to write your criticism down below! I would love to learn from you.  Also,  If you can/want tell me below how much time took you finish the game so I can make a play time estimate!

Tested by my mom
